Class Stock

    • Stock.Stock
  • public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor Description
      Stock​(java.lang.String stockAbv, java.lang.String url, javax.swing.JFrame frame, int colNum, MutableDouble balance, javax.swing.JLabel balance_label)
      Stock class for holding all associated stock information and GUI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getCurrPrice()
      Get the current price stored locally for faster purchases and less web scrapping.
      double getData()
      Returns the real-time stock prices.
      void makeGUI​(javax.swing.JFrame frame, int colNum)
      Sets up the GUI for the Stock class.
      void setCurrPrice​(double newPrice)
      Set the current price of the stock to a new value.
      void update()
      Updates the price of the stock to the real-time value and stores it to a local variable for faster access.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stock

        public Stock​(java.lang.String stockAbv,
             java.lang.String url,
             javax.swing.JFrame frame,
             int colNum,
             MutableDouble balance,
             javax.swing.JLabel balance_label)
        Stock class for holding all associated stock information and GUI.
        Parameters:
        stockAbv - Company abreviation.
        url - URL that the stock information is requested from.
        frame - Frame that the GUI is added to.
        colNum - Column number the stock is added to.
        balance - Current balance shared by all of the stocks.
        balance_label - The balance label that is shared by all of the stocks.

    • Method Detail

      • makeGUI

                    int colNum)
        Sets up the GUI for the Stock class.
        Parameters:
        frame - Frame that the GUI is added to.
        colNum - Column number the stock is added to.

      • getData

        public double getData()
        Returns the real-time stock prices.
        Returns:
        Real-time stock prices.

      • getCurrPrice

        public double getCurrPrice()
        Get the current price stored locally for faster purchases and less web scrapping.
        Returns:
        Current price stored locally.

      • setCurrPrice

        public void setCurrPrice​(double newPrice)
        Set the current price of the stock to a new value.
        Parameters:
        newPrice - The new price of the stock.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the price of the stock to the real-time value and stores it to a local variable for faster access.
